snippet: The issues troubling Mozilla, a highly unusual tech titan, run deeper than the firestorm that led to the departure of its chief, Brendan Eich, after only two weeks.
abstract: Issues troubling Mozilla run deeper than firestorm over gay marriage that led to departure of its chief, Brendan Eich, after only two weeks; highly unusual tech company encourages employees to speak their minds and criticize management, even as it has grown to 1,000 employees with more than $300 million in revenue.

byline.original: By QUENTIN HARDY and NICK BILTON

lead_paragraph: The issues troubling Mozilla, a highly unusual tech titan, run deeper than the firestorm that led to the departure of its chief, Brendan Eich, after only two weeks.

headline.main: Personality and Change Inflamed Mozilla Crisis
headline.print_headline: Personality and Change Inflamed Mozilla Crisis

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
